SENT.plain: Discrete aggregates of hematopoietic cells were observed in the bone marrows of patients with aplastic anemia or acute leukemia 14 days after marrow transplantation
The great majority of such colonies were of a single cell type, and less than 3% contained two or more cell types
Erythroid, myeloid, and undifferentiated hematopoietic colonies were approximately equal in frequency
